property.description: Property sheet to hold xml specification for forms

procedure.description: Executes an sql query against the selected database

formalParameter.description: Choose any of the available database options.
Name of the database you want to connect to. (database file name when using SQLite) and (ODBC name when using SQL Server).
Database server name.
Database port.
If cheched this option will protect your data in case of errors.
Choose any of the available display formats.
The query you want to run against the database.
Absolute path to a sql file.
Name of the configuration that contains the database user and password.
Property name used to store the result of queries.

procedure.description: Creates a backup for the specified database

formalParameter.description: Choose any of the available database options.
Name of the database you want to backup
Database server name.
Database port.
Name of the configuration that contains the database user and password.
The path where you want to store your backup file
Name of the backup file (without extention)
Absolute path to a backup command utility SQLServer(osql), Mysql(mysqldump), Oracle(exp), Postgres(pg_dump)
Configuration Name
The configuration name
